title: The Tyrant
description: I've fallen in love with Cato, and I'm not afraid to say it.  He doesn't need to say it back. I know how he feels.  Even if he doesn't have the balls to admit it.  Our daughter will be here soon, and our lives will change forever.  Will Cato let go of the past? Let go of the promise he made to execute me?  Or should I have never come back?
author: Penelope Sky
